data.text:
1. COSTA DEL SOL RCS041 EL MARTINETE RCS041 Costa del sol, Spain 5 Suites Disposes of marvelous views over the Mediterranean Sea Maximum occupancy of 10 people C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com| Tel. +34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com DESCRIPTION C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com│Tel:+34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com

2. HIGHLIGHTS FEATURES INFORMATION MAIN FACTS Magnificent views over the Mediterranean Exotic gardens Luxurious spanish villa ideally located, beachfront Awesome construction BEDROOMS Suite of 120 m2, with matrimonial bed, living área, dressers and en suite bathrooms Suite 2, with matrimonial bed and en suite bathroom Suite 3, with matrimonial bed and en suite bathroom Suite 4, with matrimonial bed and en suite bathroom Suite 5, with matrimonial bed and en suite bathroom DISTRIBUTION Large salon with sea views, disposes of a piano, sofas, TV and direct access to the terrace Dining room with table up to 20 people C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com | Tel. +34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com│Tel:+34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com

3. HIGHLIGHTS ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FEATURES & AMENITIES Air conditioning Heating Fireplace Wi fi Satellite TV Alarm system Barbecue Mixer Microwave Oven Blender Hair dryer Squeezer Tumble-dryer Dishwasher DVD DISTANCES Due to the location of El Martinete for comfort, independence and enjoyment of the area, rental car recommended. The property is situated in the beachfront 10 Min. Driving to the supermarkets, shops and stores 40 Min. Driving to the closest Airport in Málaga 10 Min. Driving to the closest Hospital in Puerto Banús 5 Min. Driving to the closest restaurants, bars and pubs C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com | Tel. +34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com│Tel:+34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com

4. HIGHLIGHTS ADITIONAL INFORMATION STAFF & SERVICES The villa offers the following staff during the stay and also the following services: Included staff: Daily cleaning service Maintenance service of the garden and the pool Private staff (not included): We have a concierge service that could attend all your needs and requests as: Transfer from the Airport High class car rental and yacht charter POLICY Maximum occupancy of 10 people Pets are not allowed The minimum rental period is 7 days PRICES The prices for el Martinete may vary depending on the season and occupancy. For further information please contact the Adamas Villas team C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com | Tel. +34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com C/Frederic Mompou, 4A, 2º4ª . 08960, Sant Just Desvern – Barcelona – Spain E – Mail: info@adamasvillas.com│Tel:+34 93 470 06 71 www.adamasvillas.com

5.
